nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.a3.maze

Class Maze

  • java.lang.Object
    • nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.a3.maze.Maze

  • public class Maze
extends java.lang.Object
    Maze class is responsible for holding the current maze and it's parameters.
